2.1.9. Lab – Test Dynamic Certificate Injection¶

In this section you will test how HTTP Connector can used to retrieve dynamic content for use in C3D.

2.1.9.1. Task – Access mtls.acme.com¶

  1. From the jumpbox’s webbrowser, access https://mtls.acme.com

  1. Login with the username: user1 and password: user1

  1. You will be logged into the site displaying the Cert userID for user1@f5lab.local
  2. Click the Expand Certificate Data Array to see the contents of the certificate.

  1. Scroll down the Certificate contents and you will see in Subject Array the commonName of the certificate is user1. This certificate was build using the contents of the certificate retrieve using HTTP Connector.

  1. Continue to scroll down to the extension array section and you will see the subjectAltName extension of user1@f5lab.local has been inserted into the minted certificate.
